title: "What is the Relationship Between Quantum Physics and Human Consciousness?"
first_phrase: This text builds on the concept of quantum mechanics as a tool to understand complex systems, particularly in the realm of human communication and consciousness. Prior to this, various authors have explored the link between quantum physics and other fields, such as sociology, linguistics, and neuroscience. In the last section, the authors discuss studies that examine the connection between meditation, brain activity, and quantum mechanics, suggesting that the brain can act as a quantum-like computer. The text provides an overview of groundbreaking research that posits new implications for our understanding of the human mind and its potential capabilities.
